EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Email_Spring_Newsletter_2018.Spring_Newsletter_Email_October_2018
EmailTemplate.subject: This Month in Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 2018 Whew! What a month! I'm exhausted! I've been running around visiting one customer after another this week and it's only Thursday! I can scarcely remember what's happened in the last week, let alone month. My brain is still a dizzying and smoldering hole from the craziness of last week's epic SpringOne Platform 2018 event in Washington, D.C., and needless to say, there are a ton of new things to investigate. So without further ado, let's get to it!
The Long and short of it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/josh-blog/this-month-in-spring-october-2nd-2018?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2019]]>
SpringOne Platform 2019 in Austin
Too early to talk about Spring One Platform 2019? Nonsense! Check out the presos and videos <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]> from this year’s event in Washington, D.C., and save the date for next year! Sign up <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2019]]> to stay informed and join us October 7–10, 2019, in Austin, Texas.
Sign up to stay informed <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2019]]>
SpringOne Tour Heads to Beijing
In the meantime, the SpringOne Tour bus lands in Beijing <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/beijing?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]> November 3, before heading to Tokyo, Seoul, and Singapore. Visit our tour page <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]> for more dates.
Reserve your seat <[[https://2018.event.springonetour.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]>
Spring Product News
Spring Tools 4 GA released <[[https://spring.io/blog/2018/09/25/spring-tools-4-ga-released?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]>
Spring Framework 5.1 goes GA <[[https://spring.io/blog/2018/09/21/spring-framework-5-1-goes-ga?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]>
Spring Data Lovelace GA released <[[https://spring.io/blog/2018/09/21/spring-data-lovelace-ga-released?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]>
Hands on with Spring Vault 2.1 <[[https://spring.io/blog/2018/09/24/hands-on-with-spring-vault-2-1?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]> Visit our site <[[https://content.pivotal.io/spring?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]> for even more Spring and Spring-adjacent content—which may or may not include recent blog posts, white papers, webinars, and videos <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dx3swKOEwZw]]>.
I want to go to there <[[https://content.pivotal.io/spring?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-october-2018]]>
